name: Ghosts
description: Transparent spirits haunting dark areas, bound to the material plane by the Beast’s magic.
lore: Lingering souls of those who perished in the Beast’s dimensional upheaval.

appearance.form: Semi-transparent, humanoid silhouettes in tattered robes.
appearance.eyes: Hollow, softly glowing in white or blue.
appearance.aura: A faint mist and cold particles float in the air nearby.
appearance.movement: Glides silently, phasing through walls with eerie flickers.
